name: Shaddoll Ruq
text: During the Main Phase: You can Fusion Summon 1 "Shaddoll" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your field or GY, but it cannot attack directly, then you can send 1 monster your opponent controls with the same Attribute as the Summoned monster to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Shaddoll Ruq" once per turn.
